name: Sea Star Mania
description:
Sea Star Mania is a smooth match 3 puzzle featuring awesome ocean figures and candies! Sea Stars, seashells, seaweed, jellyfish, seahorse and many more divine and stunning items and surprises.
GAME FEATURES:
- A new and unique gameplay of match-3 game!
- More than 100 levels and 3 scenes in the game.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface.
